div.div: Delaware Valley Coll vs. King's College

tr.td: King's wins the toss and defers; Delaware Valley will receive
Tyler Struckus kickoff 40 yards to the DVC25, John Robinson return 0 yards to the DVC25.
Kyle Schuberth rush for loss of 1 yard to the DVC24 (JakeKsiaziewicz).
Aaron Wilmer pass complete to Lewis Vincent for 30 yards to the KINGS46, 1ST DOWN DVC (Dakota Edwards).
